title: problem with lol  .... SOS!!HELP!!
body:
i dont know what happens i see the game all red and i cant play in game .... i cant play and i get a notification when i logging in  that says : 
 rating:fair 
some objects render at wrong depth ..
 
1. this is how it looks when i log in to the game: see at the bottom were the friends are and all over the window that a red color it appears:   http://i.imgur.com/t7RtGYX.png 

2. i have had a 20 min ban b/c i got into a game and i leave b/c of this prob and that's how it looks like when the time pass:  http://i.imgur.com/P9WmWWg.png

3. that's how the game look like when i am in champion selection : http://i.imgur.com/QYJGdc3.png
http://i.imgur.com/Rsv4fVS.png

4. in loading and in game i press the screenshot and it doest do something ..iut appears only black .... so i have only this pics  from my phone .. http://i.imgur.com/Bb4bm4z.jpg http://i.imgur.com/jgLFOCh.jpg  http://i.imgur.com/hdOSB7E.jpg

what can i do to fix this problem ?:) please  hep me....i try to uninstall it and then again install it but nothing happens ...

replies.body: I've had this problem before, your Nvidia graphics card driver thinks you want to run the game in 3d mode. Don't remember specifically how to disable it, but there's some Nvidia control panel you can open, and if you disable stereoscopic 3d mode there, you "should" be good to go.
ty my friend  i disable  stereoscopic 3d mode and now the game is like before  :))
